1365: If the loss is caused by:
1366: 1. A total theft of "your covered auto" or a "nonowned auto", we will pay only expenses incurred during the period: a. Beginning 48 hours after the theft; and b. Ending when "your covered auto" or the "non-owned auto" is returned to use or we pay for its loss.
1367: 2. Other than theft of a "your covered auto" or a "non-owned auto", we will pay only expenses beginning when the auto is withdrawn from use for more than 24 hours.
